alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Frio; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 1:47AM CDT until March 17 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dimmit County in south central Texas... Southeastern Zavala County in south central Texas... Southwestern Frio County in south central Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 146 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Las Vegas to 6 miles southwest of Woodward to Chaparral Wildlife Management Area, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dilley, Big Wells, Chaparral Wildlife Management Area, Light, Hilltop, Divot, Las Vegas, Catarina and Brundage. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
